name: part_004
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and guest Shiori Matsuo perform 'Blue Amber'.
Transition scene with interstellar stage visuals.
Tokoyami Towa and guest AZKi perform 'Chocho Musubi'.

subtitles.original:
ブルーアンバー
作詞・作曲：清水依与吏
subtitles.english:
Blue Amber
Lyrics & Composition: Motohiro Shimizu

subtitles.original: 抱きしめられた記憶から流れ出た赤い雫
subtitles.english: A red drop flowed from the memory of being held

subtitles.original: 他人様に見せるもんじゃないの
subtitles.english: It's not something to show to others

subtitles.original: 伝えられなかった言霊がもう一人の私になって
subtitles.english: The unspoken words became another version of me

subtitles.original: 体の内側で何かを叫んでる
subtitles.english: And they're screaming something deep inside

subtitles.original: 欲しかったのに
subtitles.english: Even though I wanted it

subtitles.original: 悔しかったのに
subtitles.english: Even though I was frustrated

subtitles.original: 駄目だよ 全部隠しておくの
subtitles.english: It's no good, I have to hide it all

subtitles.original: ごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry

subtitles.original: 悲しいのは一人で十分だからと
subtitles.english: Saying that being sad is enough for one person

subtitles.original: これ以上醜くなりたくないのと
subtitles.english: Saying I don't want to become any uglier than this

subtitles.original: 私の中で誰にも見つけられずに
subtitles.english: Inside of me, without being found by anyone

subtitles.original: こんな色になるまで泣いていたんだね
subtitles.english: You've been crying until you turned this color

subtitles.original: 綺麗だよ
subtitles.english: It's beautiful

subtitles.original: 私そびれた心から流れ出た青い雫
subtitles.english: A blue drop flowed from a heart that missed out

subtitles.original: 他人様に浴びせるもんじゃないの
subtitles.english: It's not something to shower others with

subtitles.original: 全部遠くへ飲み込んで遠くの海原底に沈んで
subtitles.english: Swallow it all deep down and sink it to the sea floor

subtitles.original: そのまま宝石にでもなれるのを待つの
subtitles.english: And wait for it to eventually become a gemstone

subtitles.original: 本当は嘘で飾って
subtitles.english: Decorating the truth with lies

subtitles.original: 毒みたいなくらしで慰めて
subtitles.english: Consoling myself in a life like poison

subtitles.original: 誰かの悲劇で自分の悲劇を癒して
subtitles.english: Healing my own tragedy with someone else's

subtitles.original: 恋しさに溺れた瞬間のままで
subtitles.english: Remaining at the moment I drowned in longing

subtitles.original: 息も出来ずただ愛してるの
subtitles.english: I love you, simply unable to even breathe

subtitles.original: 悲しいのは一人で十分だからと
subtitles.english: Saying that being sad is enough for one person

subtitles.original: これ以上醜くなりたくないのと
subtitles.english: Saying I don't want to become any uglier than this

subtitles.original: 私の中で誰にも見つけられずに
subtitles.english: Inside of me, without being found by anyone

subtitles.original: こんな色になるまで泣いていたんだね
subtitles.english: You've been crying until you turned this color

subtitles.original: 綺麗だよ
subtitles.english: It's beautiful

subtitles.original: ごめんね
subtitles.english: I'm sorry

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: 綺麗だよ
subtitles.english: It's beautiful

subtitles.original:
蝶々結び
作詞・作曲：野田洋次郎
subtitles.english:
Chocho Musubi
Lyrics & Composition: Yojiro Noda

subtitles.original: 片っぽで丸を作って しっかり持ってて
subtitles.english: Make a loop with one end, and hold it tight

subtitles.original: もう片っぽでその丸の後ろを ぐるっと回って
subtitles.english: With the other end, wrap it around the back of that loop

subtitles.original: 間にできたポッケに入って 出てくるの待ってて
subtitles.english: Go into the pocket made in between, and wait for it

subtitles.original: 出てきたところを迎えにきて せーので引っぱって
subtitles.english: Come to meet it when it emerges, and pull together

subtitles.original: 初めは何とも情けない形だとしても
subtitles.english: Even if at first it's a somewhat pathetic shape

subtitles.original: 同じだけ力を込めて
subtitles.english: Put in equal amounts of strength

subtitles.original: 羽は大きく 結び目は固く なるようにきつく
subtitles.english: So the wings are large and the knot is firm

subtitles.original: 結んでいてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to keep it tied

subtitles.original: 出会いはここに
subtitles.english: The encounter is here

subtitles.original: 思い出は遠くに
subtitles.english: The memories are far away

subtitles.original: 置いておいてほしい ほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to leave them be, I want you to
